title: Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream and his classmates

preview.html: I like fans subscribers fans Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream and his classmates Seeing an old friend in a dream is one of the visions that has many different connotations and interpretations, depending on the different state of the visionary in which he will be, so we will provide you with interpretations of translation experts about this vision to help you. Let's show whether this vision is good or bad. Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream If an old friend sees this dream in a dream, it indicates that he will hear good news, God willing. If you see an unmarried girl, an old friend in a dream indicates many of the fears and sorrows that this girl experiences in her life. Seeing an old friend crying in a dream about an unmarried woman indicates that this friend needs this girl's help and that God is the Most High and All-Knowing. Following a single woman is a good old friend means that she will achieve all her goals that she was striving for by God's command. Seeing classmates in a dream as singles Ibn Sirin said that seeing classmates in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the problems that the girl will face. If an unmarried woman sees her classmates in her dream, this dream indicates the arrival of livelihood, kindness and a lot of money, God knows best. I see a free girl As for classmates in a dream, it symbolizes the fears, sorrows and difficulties that she will face in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with her colleagues means that her life will change for the better, thank God, in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing someone she has not seen for a long time Seeing a person You have not seen him for a long time in a dreamer's dream indicates his great position in the heart of the dreamer, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer constantly sees someone he has not seen for a long time, this dream shows his great love for him and his desire to see him. Seeing a dreamer killing a relative indicates that he will suffer a great loss in his trade in the coming period. Seeing a dreamer marrying a girl he has not seen for a long time symbolizes happy circumstances and good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream of shaking hands with an old friend Ibn Sirin said that seeing an old friend shaking hands in a dream symbolizes longing for the past and seeing old friends. The dream of shaking hands with an old friend in a dream indicates loneliness and the desire to form new social relationships. If the sleeper sees that shaking hands with an old friend and hugging him in a dream, because this dream indicates the strength of the bond between them, and God knows best. Shaking hands and kissing the dreamer's friend in a dream indicates the many problems that the dreamer will face in the coming period. To see my friend's marriage in a dream If he only sees that her friend got married in a dream, this dream indicates that she will get married soon, God willing. Seeing a married woman marrying her friend in a dream means stability Family and marital happiness for the dreamer. The girl who sees her married friend in a dream indicates the coming of goodness, livelihood and abundance of money for her, God willing. Seeing my married friend in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve all the goals he was trying to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband’s friend in a dream Dream of seeing

title: Interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream in detail according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cotton. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cotton in a dream that whoever sees that he is saving white cotton, this is evidence that he will save money for his children. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, whoever sees that he is collecting cotton inside a bag, this is evidence of marriage. With a fair woman of birth and status. Seeing cotton in one dreamIf an unmarried girl sees that she is buying cotton and placing it in her dream, this is evidence that she will inherit a legitimate inheritance, as she is choosing cotton from the field, which means that she will earn from her lawful work. For example, or that he will find a new job or work from which he will earn a living. Seeing cotton in a married woman’s dream When a married woman sees in her dream that she is saving cotton, this is evidence of delaying childbearing for some time. She saw that she was selling cotton, so she invested in a project to earn money. A living. Cotton in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams of cotton in the field only without picking it, this means that she will enjoy security when she gives birth and her new baby. Interpretation of seeing cotton in a dream for a man. The presence of cotton in a dream for a man indicates that he will obtain a lot of sustenance and goodness and earn money. What is lawful belongs to God and he perseveres in worship. Interpretation of seeing cotton by NabulsiNabulsi will interpret seeing cotton in a dream as livelihood and money, repentance from sins, or as a righteous person.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Since the flood in a dream has many connotations and meanings in which dream interpretation scholars differ, you may also be interested in knowing the difference between a dream and a vision, but the interpretation of a dream is always according to the surrounding circumstances. The dreamer, therefore it is important not to take into account the interpretations of the visions that we will give in the dream. What the dreamer saw regardless of the correspondence, because the dreamer’s conditions and circumstances must be explained so that his interpretation of the vision becomes more accurate, so we advise when someone sees a dream and wants to interpret it, to consult a sheikh and explain the dream to him and explain the special circumstances so that the scholar can interpret the dream accurately. Interpretation of the Flood by Ibn Sirin It is It indicates an epidemic coming to the people of this place. The arrival of the flood indicates an enemy attack and the landing of the military in the country and will not harm the people. Interpretation of the flood in a dream by Ibn Shahin This indicates a serious disease that is spreading, and homes are more dangerous and stronger. Interpretation of the flood in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq, even if it does not indicate unrest. It indicates one of three things: the great enemy, the unjust ruler, or the army soldiers, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a flood in a dream indicates an epidemic that will affect the city in which the dreamer lives, so if the flood is red This means great harm will happen to the residents of that city. Just as the interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream is entering the dreamer’s city and flooding it, this indicates the invasion of armies and soldiers into the city in which the dreamer lives, and God knows best. Seeing a flood in a dream for a manInterpretation of seeing a flood in a dream of a man running away from it, this indicates the disaster that He would have fallen into it, but he survived it, and God knows best. Also, if the color of the flood was red, this indicates the spread of an epidemic throughout the city and causing serious harm and damage to its people. As for seeing the torrent from the great and violent flood, it indicates that the wrath of God will extend to the place where the person or What happened in the flood, and God knows best, and God knows best. Seeing a flood in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream for a pregnant woman is that she is about to give birth, especially if the flood sweeps the city. As for a pregnant woman seeing a flood in the city from the sea, this indicates the abundance of livelihood that she will receive. And its people, and God knows best. Also, seeing a pregnant woman from a flood many times in a dream is a sign of getting rid of problems and fears. Seeing a flood in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream for a married woman shows a lot of goodness, especially if the flood did not leave any devastating effect on The dream. Just like the wife seeing the flood rushing into the city where the married woman lives, this shows the fear that will rule that city, and God knows best. As for the flood flowing into the married woman’s house in the dream, this indicates fear hitting the house. Seeing the flood in a dream Single Women: A flood in a dream can be interpreted for single women, especially if it is a large flood

title: Interpretation of seeing neighbors in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing neighbors in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, neighbors are among the people who surround the house and can influence the people who live in it. Seeing them has different meanings and interpretations, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing neighbors in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing neighbors in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is marrying his neighbor’s son, This is a good vision and has many connotations. Seeing a neighbor’s son in a good image is a dream worthy of praise. If the sleeper sees his neighbor who has a high degree of beauty, then this is a sign of the dreamer’s luck in life, and this vision also shows the arrival of pleasant events. Faqih Ibn Sirin says that the woman If a married woman sees her neighbor in her dream, this is evidence that she feels confident and secure in her life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing neighbors alone in a dream If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her neighbor was sitting with her and that the neighbor is very religious and has virtuous morals, then this is a vision that heralds the arrival of her abundant livelihood to the dreamer. And blessed. If the unmarried girl’s neighbor is causing a lot of trouble, and the unmarried girl sees her in her dream, then this is an unpleasant vision and indicates that some difficulties will come in the dreamer’s life and he will have to seek God’s help to get rid of them. she has. From all those problems and difficulties that disturb her peace. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is going to her neighbor’s house, this is a vision that indicates safety, protection, and calm in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a neighbor’s son in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her neighbor He asks for her hand in marriage and wants to marry her. This dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance in the coming period. This vision may indicate that the dreamer will be able to achieve all the goals and ambitions that she seeks. Interpretation of the dream of seeing neighbors in a dream for a woman Married: Interpretation scholars say: If a married woman sees in her dream that her neighbor is making many requests in an annoying way, then this vision indicates that there is someone trying to interfere between the dreamer and her husband, and she must beware of that. around. Her.If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting with her neighbor, and that this neighbor is religious and has good morals, then this is a sign that great goodness will come to her life.If a married woman sees her vengeful neighbor in her dream, this is a vision that indicates solutions to problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a good-looking neighbor in a married woman’s dream indicates the security and stability in which the dreamer lives. Interpretation of a dream about seeing joy in a dream with neighbors. If the sleeper sees in his dream the presence of joy in the neighbor’s house, then this is a good vision that portends the coming of happy events in his life and hearing news that brings happiness. For the people of his house. Interpretation of a dream about seeing food with neighbors in a dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating with neighbors and the food tastes good, this indicates a good relationship and affection.

title: Interpretation of a dream in which you see or hear Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream and seeing or hearing the recitation of Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream indicates the piety of the dreamer and his faith because it indicates his abstention from lying and following the truth. One of the surahs of the Holy Qur’an, and seeing this surah, the dreamer often searches for an interpretation of seeing or hearing this surah in a dream. Also, reading Surat Al-Ahzab in a girl’s dream indicates the girl’s righteousness, piety, and avoidance of sins. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl in a dream or hearing her in Surat Al-Ahzab has many interpretations. One of the most important of these interpretations is that this girl will get married soon. The young man has many good and virtuous qualities and will be so. This young man also had a prominent position among the people around him. This is the interpretation of seeing or hearing Surah Al-Ahzab in the dream of an unmarried girl with one of her friends. However, it indicates that this single girl has good company Very nice and cute. But seeing an unmarried girl or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in her dream in the bathroom. It appears that this girl is committing many sins. He must abstain from all these sins and repent to God Almighty, Forgiving and Merciful. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream For a married woman, seeing or hearing a married woman in her dream of Surah Al-Ahzab has many connotations. Among them is when he sees or hears a married woman in a dream of Surah Al-Ahzab. This is evidence that this woman has committed many sins, but she has repented and repented to God Almighty. Likewise, seeing or hearing a woman Married in her dream indicates Surah Al-Ahzab. This woman suffered from some worries and concerns, but thanks to her, she succeeded. God Almighty got rid of all these worries and problems. Seeing a married woman in her sleep or hearing Surah Al-Ahzab. Announces that this woman will become pregnant soon by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation A dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream about a pregnant woman is because the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream differs from the interpretation of an unmarried girl. Some scholars who interpret dreams interpreted this vision as follows. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab indicates that this woman is one of The sex of her fetus. Also, seeing a pregnant woman or hearing Surah Al-Ahzab in her dream indicates that she is pregnant. May God bless this woman with an easy and easy birth. During this time, she will not experience many of the discomforts and pains of childbirth. This vision has also been interpreted as an indication of the earliest date For the birth of this woman. It also relieves her of many worries, problems, and sadness that she is experiencing during this time. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream about a divorced woman. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream indicates the near end of one’s worries. It also indicates a shift in This woman’s life is for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream about a man. If a man sees or hears Surat Al-Ahzab in a dream, it has many meanings and elements, such as: And soon God Almighty will bless this man with a good wife who has many qualities. Seeing or hearing Married man f

title: Interpretation of underwear in a dream

preview.html: Some people search for an interpretation of underwear in a dream. Although it is one of the rare dreams that does not occur often for a person, it carries many different meanings, depending on its shape, condition, and color. It's in a dream. Because it is one of the strange dreams that the viewer enjoys great admiration when exposed to it, we will show you through the following lines of the encyclopedia all the details related to this dream, so you just have to follow us. Interpretation of underwear in a dream. Interpretation of buying underwear in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation jurists unanimously agreed that Buying underwear in a dream is one of the dreams that does not lead to good, as it is a sign of the end of her emotional connection with the person she loves. Some claim that seeing underwear in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that she will enter into a forbidden relationship with someone who will betray her and she must be careful. She finds in her dream that someone is giving her underwear, then her dream is considered a sign of a relationship between her and this person in reality. Buying underwear, if she has a dress, or other beautiful clothes, is a sign of an unmarried woman’s engagement or marriage in the future. Nearby. A free woman should take care of the condition of these clothes, whether they are clean or dirty, because if they are clean, it is a sign of happiness and abundance of goodness. If it is dirty, it is a sign of failure of vision and her inability to achieve what she dreamed of in reality. Interpretation of underwear in a dream for a married woman: Seeing clean underwear with bright colors is a sign of happiness and stability that a married woman enjoys in her life. If the clothes are dirty or worn out This is a sign of the difficulties and problems that she will face in life. If a woman finds herself buying underwear for a child, this is a sign of pregnancy, God willing. If it is for a male, then it is a sign of the birth of a female, and if it is for a female, then it is a sign of the birth of a male, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision of a pregnant woman does not differ from that of a married woman in interpreting the vision of underwear, as it is a sign of the sex of the fetus, and it also shows the degree of understanding and stability between her and her husband, depending on the situation. You see it in a dream. Underwear in a man’s dream. Most often, seeing underwear in a man’s dream is a sign of the approaching date of his wife, God willing. If these clothes are uncomfortable, or he cannot wear them easily, then this is a sign of problems and difficulties that he will face in life. Seeing Clothes that are dirty or have some holes are an indication that he will enter a difficult stage and he must be patient until comfort comes from God Almighty. In some cases, the vision of a married man buying underwear is a sign that his wife is pregnant, God willing. If the underwear is comfortable and the dreamer prefers it in the dream, then it is A sign of comfort and happiness in reality. Other indicators of seeing underwear in a dream: If the dreamer finds that he is wearing underwear, then...
preview.text: Some people search for an interpretation of underwear in a dream. Although it is one of the rare dreams that does not occur often for a person, it carries many different meanings, depending on its shape, condition, and color. It's in a dream. Because it is one of the strange dreams that the viewer enjoys great admiration when exposed to it, we will show you through the following lines of the encyclopedia all the details related to this dream, so you just have to follow us. Interpretation of underwear in a dream. Interpretation of buying underwear in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation jurists unanimously agreed that Buying underwear in a dream is one of the dreams that does not lead to good, as it is a sign of the end of her emotional connection with the person she loves. Some claim that seeing underwear in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that she will enter into a forbidden relationship with someone who will betray her and she must be careful. She finds in her dream that someone is giving her underwear, then her dream is considered a sign of a relationship between her and this person in reality. Buying underwear, if she has a dress, or other beautiful clothes, is a sign of an unmarried woman’s engagement or marriage in the future. Nearby. A free woman should take care of the condition of these clothes, whether they are clean or dirty, because if they are clean, it is a sign of happiness and abundance of goodness. If it is dirty, it is a sign of failure of vision and her inability to achieve what she dreamed of in reality. Interpretation of underwear in a dream for a married woman: Seeing clean underwear with bright colors is a sign of happiness and stability that a married woman enjoys in her life. If the clothes are dirty or worn out This is a sign of the difficulties and problems that she will face in life. If a woman finds herself buying underwear for a child, this is a sign of pregnancy, God willing. If it is for a male, then it is a sign of the birth of a female, and if it is for a female, then it is a sign of the birth of a male, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision of a pregnant woman does not differ from that of a married woman in interpreting the vision of underwear, as it is a sign of the sex of the fetus, and it also shows the degree of understanding and stability between her and her husband, depending on the situation. You see it in a dream. Underwear in a man’s dream. Most often, seeing underwear in a man’s dream is a sign of the approaching date of his wife, God willing. If these clothes are uncomfortable, or he cannot wear them easily, then this is a sign of problems and difficulties that he will face in life. Seeing Clothes that are dirty or have some holes are an indication that he will enter a difficult stage and he must be patient until comfort comes from God Almighty. In some cases, the vision of a married man buying underwear is a sign that his wife is pregnant, God willing. If the underwear is comfortable and the dreamer prefers it in the dream, then it is A sign of comfort and happiness in reality. Other indicators of seeing underwear in a dream: If the dreamer finds that he is wearing underwear, then...

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about someone chasing me

preview.html: Interpreting a dream about someone chasing me is a topic that requires a fairly precise interpretation, as the interpretation varies according to the social status of the viewer, as well as according to the psychological state and the general atmosphere of the vision, and because catching up with others is hidden behind a lot. Different motives and goals, we will share with you all the signs and signals related to the vision.Interpretation of a dream about someone chasing meInterpretation of dreams about someone chasing me indicates that the dreamer will get into some problems or suffer from some things that he fears in the near future, and the vision indicates the presence of a large number of his haters and haters. He should not rush to trust anyone and be more careful in his choices. Seeing someone following me means something forbidden or forbidden that the dreamer does from time to time and cannot get rid of. This may indicate his desire to get rid of some things that bother him, but he sees in The same inability to do so. Developing for the better or moving forward. Interpretation of a dream about a person following me by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Kathir’s interpretation, the dream of a person following me symbolizes the sufferer’s suffering from many problems in his life, and it is most likely that this suffering will be physical, as the vision may indicate that the dreamer will reach and achieve his goals. But after so much misery and misery, he must not despair or surrender to the bitter reality. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about someone following me shows that the dreamer has a strong personality and good thinking, and this is what will make him overcome the crises surrounding him. Unhappy, this indicates his fear of the future in general, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about someone chasing me for one person: Seeing someone chasing someone means that he will be exposed to a series of problems in the coming days, especially if this person is unknown or shows signs of terror and fear during the dream. If she sees If an unmarried woman sees someone following her in a dream, and this person is known and familiar to her, then this is evidence of the approaching date of her wedding, and the vision also symbolizes the girl’s strong faith and self-confidence in her mastery. And herself, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about someone chasing me for a married woman. Interpretation of dreams about someone chasing me for a married woman is one of the dreams that indicate the despair that overwhelms her and symbolizes her lack of ingenuity and her inability to bear the responsibility that revolves around her. The dream also shows many problems that will affect her psyche. Or on women. Her condition is unusual, and these problems are often between her and her husband or his family. If this person goes beyond and reinforces them, this is an indication of problems that can be dealt with and overcome. If she is not able to overcome them, this indicates her stability, the strength of her character, and her ability to overcome difficulties on her own without the need for anyone’s support. Interpretation of a dream about someone following me for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees someone following her in her dream, this means that she is worried about some matters in her life, And troubled in the dream, this means that she will face some difficulties during the period of childbirth and beyond, by God. He knows better. Interpretation of dreams about someone chasing me for a divorced woman. A vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green lemon tree and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green lemon tree and its meaning, as seeing a lemon tree coming is one of the visions that attracts many to learn about the interpretations and explanations it contains, especially since trees in general are a sign of goodness and abundance of the fortune teller’s diet, but interpretations differ from one person to another, based on his social status, and it also differs from what he sees in his dreams, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing the color green. Lemon and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a green lemon tree and its meaning As seeing green lemons is one of the visions that inspire optimism, and according to what many scholars and experts in dream interpretation have explained, it includes associations and interpretations that are considered positive and convey good messages to the seer, and here we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing a green lemon tree and its meaning, it is also: If a person sees a green lemon in a dream. This dream is a sign that he will soon marry the girl he wants to get engaged to and marry. Seeing a lemon tree in a dream, and that the dreamer collects a lot of lemons from it. It is evidence of the satisfaction of desires, and all the goals he seeks to achieve. Also seeing green lemon trees in a dream. It is evidence of the imminent harvest and harvest of the fruits of a person's work for many years. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing gasoline in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its implications Interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree for a single woman These visions when seen in the dream of an unmarried girl have many interpretations, meanings and connotations, as they differ between positive and others that serve as warning messages for her, and in this paragraph we explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about a lemon tree for a single woman is also: A girl Seeing a lemon tree and picking it in a dream. It is a sign that this girl's wedding is approaching. Also, seeing a lemon tree gives great immunity and protects a person from any danger he faces. If an unmarried woman sees a lemon tree in a dream, its branches grow. This indicates that this girl's mother is always keen to provide her with happiness and comfort. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a donkey in a dream in detail from the most famous interpreters Lemon interpretations of dreams of the dead Since seeing the dead in a dream is one of those visions that worry the dreamer, he is always ready to know the interpretations and signs contained in the dream and whether they are good interpretations or carry messages that warn him. On a specific topic, and in the context we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about a dead lemon, which is also: Seeing a lemon in a dream about the dead is one of the dreams that alerts you to a specific problem. If it is green, this dream is evidence of the dead person’s need for some charity or his bad prayers. Accordingly, it differs according to the color in which it appears in the dream or the state in which the dead person appears. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prince or princess in a dream from the most famous scholars of interpretation Interpretation of seeing rotten lemons As rotten lemons in a dream are among the dreams that carry many interpretations, which can be bad or not

title: The 50 most important interpretations of the dream of birds by Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about birds: A person seeing birds in his dream indicates many different meanings, such as those that indicate goodness and happy events in his life, and others that bring with them sadness and worries, and jurists depend in their interpretation on the condition of the dreamer. And the events mentioned in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about birds: If a person dreams that he is carrying birds on his back, this is a sign that he will be exposed to many difficult crises that will weaken his strength and withdraw all his energy in the coming days. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is carrying a bird in his hands, then he will obtain huge material gains. Many blessings will come in his life. Birds in a dream indicate good luck that will be on the dreamer’s side, which will allow him to achieve his goals and aspirations with ease and comfort in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about bird eggs in a businessman’s dream indicates the success of all the deals he manages and reaping many of their fruits. And its benefits. If the dreamer sees in his dream that the bird is biting him, then this vision is not good and shows that those around him are following him and saying things that he did not do to discredit him and the dream also expresses physical or psychological problems. If the dreamer sees the bird unrestrained in his dream, this indicates that he is an adventurous person He likes to try strange and new things. Interpretation of a dream about birds by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees birds in his dream, this is a sign of his ability to achieve the ambitions he sought despite the difficulties he faces. If someone sees bird feathers in a dream, this is a clear indication that many benefits and nourishment Abundant material wealth will come into his life in the coming period. A dream about eating delicious bird meat in a dream indicates to a worker that he will obtain a high position in his job and his salary will increase. Seeing a person in a dream swimming with birds in the vision bodes well for him and means that he will have a suitable opportunity to travel. Outside his homeland, which will bring him a lot of profits in the near future. As Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees in his dream that he is feeding birds, this is evidence of his generosity in morals, his charity to the needy, and spending money for the sake of God, following the example of our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Peace be upon him. And they gave him peace. If one sees a bird unknown to him in his dream, his life will soon end. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a single woman: Birds in a single woman’s dream indicate that she has set her goals in life and has enough energy and enthusiasm to achieve them. Seeing a bird girl in a dream represents reaching The heights of glory and excellence in the scientific aspect and in work in the coming days. If the dreamer is an unrelated girl and sees birds in her sleep, she will start a new emotional relationship that will bring her happiness. Seeing the same girl who was not married before slaughtering birds, then God will relieve her of her distress and remove Berries in the coming days. If an unmarried woman dreams that birds are running quickly and entering her house, then this dream is praiseworthy and indicates the arrival of good news and happy tidings in her life. Interpretation of a dream about colored birds for a single womanIf the dreamer is single and sees colorful birds in

title: Interpretation of seeing palaces and fruits of paradise in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans The interpretation of seeing the palaces of Paradise and its fruits in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates that he has attained a high position at work, to repent and regret what he did. Do you see the palaces of Paradise? It symbolizes obtaining a high position and will achieve an excellent position. What does it mean to drink water from the river? It indicates happiness And kindness. What does it mean to drink from a river in Paradise? It indicates great happiness and kindness. Entering Paradise with many people? It symbolizes the dreamer’s life in the afterlife, and God knows best. What does it mean to eat fruit in a dream? The importance of beneficial knowledge and lawful money. What is the meaning of seeing milk from the sky or Drinking wine? This indicates his wisdom. What is the meaning of seeing the fruit of Paradise in a dream? It symbolizes the sciences and knowledge that the dreamer has acquired. Interpretation of seeing palaces in a dream. Seeing palaces of Paradise in a dream, which symbolizes assuming a high position and reaching a great position, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried young man in a dream It portends him marrying a beautiful girl of a great and honorable lineage. If the dreamer sees him giving the fruits of paradise to those around him in a dream, this symbolizes people benefiting from his good management of matters or benefiting from his money or wisdom. Eating fruit in a dream indicates useful knowledge and lawful money that the Lord has received. He sees in a dream the fruits of Paradise and the dreamer is unable to eat them, and he warns of the corruption of his morals and does not feel fear of God Almighty, and he must repent and return to God, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream for a single woman: Eating the fruits of Paradise in a dream indicates the girl’s success in her studies, and if She was working, this indicates that she occupies an excellent position. After that, seeing her come and feel happy in a dream symbolizes the approaching marriage of a high-ranking young man. Drinking water from a river in a dream indicates the happiness and goodness that the girl enjoys. If the girl sees in a dream someone preventing her From drinking, this indicates that she has committed sins and disobedience, and she must repent and regret what she did, and God knows best. The vision promises achieving goals and a feeling of happiness and comfort. The vision also symbolizes achieving successive successes and collecting abundant money, and God knows best. See what is inside Paradise in a dream. See the point of joy. Paradise in a dream. This is piety and fear of God. He does not commit sins, and God knows best. Sitting under a tree in Paradise indicates that all of the dreamer’s conditions will improve, and he will enter Paradise, and God knows best. Eating its fruits in a dream means gaining good knowledge and earning permissible money. See the warning about the fruit and he cannot take from it. That he is corrupt and does not fear his Lord, and God knows best. If he sees that he lives in one of the palaces of Paradise, then the vision indicates a great position that he will obtain, because a single person in a dream symbolizes his marriage to a beautiful woman. Eating milk from the sky or drinking wine in a dream indicates The wisdom that a person enjoys. Since the vision of drinking from the Kawthar River in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer follows the Sunnah of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. The previous vision in the dream of an infidel portends his conversion to Islam and his advice. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about entering Paradise in a dream. Seeing Paradise in
